decision_conditions:
The existing 16.5m high monopole and its concrete base (as shown on drawing nos.  97029-00-002-MD019 Rev. 19; 97029-00-000-MD019 Rev. 19;  and 97029-22-150-MD018 Rev. 18 submitted in the support of this application) shall be removed within 6 (six) months from the date of the installation of the replacement monopole mast hereby approved.

Reason: To ensure the development complies with the terms of the application and in the interest of visual amenity.
description: Telecommunication - Remove existing monopole and concrete base. Installation of 20m Multiuser FLI DM4 Monopole mast and new concrete base.   Relocation of H3G and EE antenna to new mast at 15.75m. 3x new CTIL (TEF) antenna and ancillaries at 18.95m and 3 x new CTIL (TEF) antenna and ancillaries at 19.55m on new headframe of new mast. 1x new GPS antenna at 20m on new supporting steelwork. Installation of 3x new equipment cabinets on concrete base. New meter cabinet within the compound fence line. Ancillary works including new ducting within compound and installation of 3x 12-pair Multicore Fibre Cables, 3x DC cables and 3x 7-way BoBâ€™s utilising new cable management, gantry ladder and support systems. (Summary)
site_name: Telecommunication Installation At Redbridge Storm Tanks
application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
